a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball III

p.k: The Fan / The Coach / The Recipe / The Puppy / The Name / The Extras / The Gripes / The Vacation / The Fraud Sarah the new kid in school is Gumball and Darwin's number one slightly obsessive fan. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / The secret behind Anton's immortality. / The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted except itâ€™s a turtle. / When Mum reveals that Gumball's real name is Zach Gumball adopts a cheesy annoying persona to match the name. / Nothing much is happening for Gumball and Darwin and the background characters in Elmore seize their moment. / Gumball is in such a bad mood that it spreads to Darwin who joins him in complaining about everything. / The Wattersons are swapping scary stories on a family vacation when their car breaks down in the middle of the desert. / When Gumball and Darwin discover his diploma is fake Principal Brown is determined to keep their discovery a secret.
